title: Massive Frame Drops
body:
I have been playing League for a fair bit now and it's always run just fine. Full screen, max res, highest settings, all just fine.
But recently, I have been getting massive FPS drops every 5 seconds or so and it's making the game unplayable.
I am positive it's not my computer because it is ONLY in League Of Legends.
The only thing I can think of is Win 10 not working so well with patch 7.1

Anyone know how to fix this? I would normally get 100+ frames, but I have it capped at 60 now and it still drops to around 10-6 every 5 seconds.

replies.body:
Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
